name: BulletRage Demo
detailed_description: BulletRage Kickstarter Combat demo showing one full level and 2 preset weapons.
about_the_game: BulletRage Kickstarter Combat demo showing one full level and 2 preset weapons.
short_description: BulletRage Kickstarter Combat demo showing one full level and 2 preset weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit Windows
  • Processor: i3 Processor
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 660M / Radeon HD 7730
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: SteamOS / Ubuntu 16.04 (With latest graphics drivers)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 660M / Radeon HD 7730
